products.name: S.H.Figuarts Piccolo (The Proud Namekian)
Dragon Ball Z S.H. Figuarts Action Figure Great Ape Vegeta Tamashii Web Exclusive 35 cm
products.description:
Finally, GREAT APE VEGETA from Dragon Ball joins S.H.Figuarts brand with super big size of 35 cm!! This highly posable giant figure recreates several memorial scenes from Dragon Ball animation!

This set includes an optional left hand, two optional right hands, an optional grabbing hand parts for miniature Goku, an optional eyes part, two tail parts (Normal/Cut), miniature Yajirobe figure and a special display stand.

It stands approx. 35 cm tall and comes in a window box.

products.name: Dragon Ball Z S.H. Figuarts Action Figure Son Goku Kaioken 14 cm
products.description:
A figure of Son Goku in his epic "Kaioh-ken" form! Finished with beautiful pearlescent parts to accentuate this dynamic move's power, you can recreate battles with Captain Ginyu, Vegeta, and Frieza (Sold separately)! The figure includes an optional head, two optional expression parts, and two pairs of optional hands.

It stands approx. 14 cm tall and comes in a window box.

products.name: Dragon Ball S.H. Figuarts Action Figure Jackie Chun 14 cm
products.description:
Jackie Chun, who is the master of Marcial Arts, now joins S.H.Figuarts with full action! As well as funny face for him, various optional parts recreate the scenes from comics / TV series! This figure includes two optional face parts, seven optional right hands, six optional left hands, optional arm parts (R/L), a microphone part and dragon ball object (three-star ball at summoning Shenron).

It stands approx. 14 cm tall and comes in a window box.

products.name: Dragon Ball S.H. Figuarts Action Figure Tao Pai Pai Tamashii Web Exclusive 15 cm
products.description:
Tao Pai Pai from Dragon Ball joins S.H.Figuarts series! Along with main body, additional face part for Dodon-pa and for the special killing move with his tangue are included. Also this set has pillar for flying and special stage for the flying pose. This set includes 2 optional face parts, 3 optional right hands, 2 optional left hands, a pillar, a set of special stand, a Dragon Ball (seven star), optional cloth parts and 2 optional soles for right/left foot.

It stands approx. 15 cm tall and comes in a window box.

products.name: Dragon Ball S.H. Figuarts Action Figure Krillin (The Early Years) 10 cm
products.description:
The hugely popular Krillin joins the S.H.Figurarts series of highly posable and accurately sculpted action figures! This is the ultimate portrayal of Goku's onetime rival turned best friend forever. The set includes four left and five right optional hands, two optional expression parts, a Kamehameha effect, a "turtle" stone, a stand, and a six-star Dragon Ball (Ryushinchu).

It stands approx. 10 cm tall and comes in a window box.

products.name: Batman Ninja S.H. Figuarts Action Figure Joker Demon King of the Sixth Heaven 16 cm
products.description: An incredible rendition of Batman's eternal enemy, the Joker, as seen in the hit Japanese anime Ninja Batman! Includes two fans, a katana sword with scabbard, optional head, and four optional pairs of hands.

products.name: HQS – DBZ – Piccolo’s Redemption
products.description:
Estátua do personagem Piccolo e Gohan, como aparece na série Dragon Ball Z, retratando a parte epica onde o Piccolo sacrifica a vida para salvar o Son Gohan, na linha HQS da Tsume. Esta estátua mede cerca de 39 cm de altura e é feita em Polyresin.

Edição limitada de 2500 peças.

products.name: HQS – DBZ – The Quiet Wrath of Son Goku
products.description:
Estátua do Son Goku e Nappa, como aparecem na série Dragon Ball Z, retratando a parte epica onde o Son Goku se vinga do Nappa, depois de usar o Kaio-ken a primeira vez, na linha HQS da Tsume. Esta estátua mede cerca de 43 cm de altura e é feita em Polyresin.

Edição limitada de 4000 peças.

products.name: bandai Dragonball Super S.H. Figuarts Action Figure Freeza -Resurrection-
products.description:
bandai Dragonball Super S.H. Figuarts Action Figure Freeza -Resurrection-


"I am the mighty Frieza, and all of the horrible stories you've heard are true!"
From the anime Dragon Ball Super comes the wild and wildly powerful Frieza! His ancient yet ageless evil charm is captured in this action figure, letting fans replicate famed scenes from the series! The figure includes four pairs of optional hands, one set of optional arms, one set of optional legs, angel's halo, two optional expressions, tail, two effect parts and one effect part stand, plus a custom base (with a plate, support arm, and clip).

products.name: Bandai Dragonball Xenoverse S.H. Figuarts Action Figure Trunks
products.description:
Action figures Dragon Ball
The first Dragonball Xenoverse characters join the S.H.Figuarts series: Trunks and Time Patroller! These characters from the super smash hit videogame come with optional heads to replicate Super Saiyajin mode, just like in the game. The 14 cm Trunks figure comes with 3 types of optional hands (L/R), 3 optional expressions, an optional head, the Book of Ending and Beginning, and two types of sword (one stowed, one ready for action.)

products.name: Bandai Vegetto SH Figuarts Event Exclusive Color Edition
products.description:
PRODUCT OVERVIEW


Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan Vegito is released in all-new modeling !
Comes with a variety of face parts such as his iconic compound smile, the teeth-gritting face for action scenes, and the shouting face for the Kamehameha pose. Also comes with effect parts for his special attack Final Kamehameha !
The special attack Spirit Sword that he used against Fused Zamasu is detachable and can recreate the scene where it penetrates Zamasu’s body !

products.name: Bandai Dragonball S.H. Figuarts Action Figure Master Roshi Tamashii Web Exclusive
products.description:
Bandai Dragonball S.H. Figuarts Action Figure Master Roshi Tamashii Web Exclusive
Goku's master in his younger years, and a regular presence in Dragon Ball Super today, joins S.H.Figurarts! Long requested by fans, Master Roshi is finally here after attracting huge amounts of attention at Tamashii Nations events.
Includes removable shell, four pairs of optional hands, three optional heads (battle, laughing, and without glasses), three optional mouths (closed, open, grinning), a cane, a Dragon Ball (three stars), and a stand.

products.name: Bandai Dragon Ball Super Broly S.H. Figuarts Action Figure Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan Goku Super
products.description:
Bandai Dragon Ball Super Broly S.H. Figuarts Action Figure Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan Goku Super
The film "Dragon Ball Super: Broly" was one of the biggest (and fastest!) hits in the series. Now S.H.Figuarts is proud to announce the release of a figure of its star character, Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan Son Goku! It includes an outfit just like the one seen on the film's poster - a first! Don't miss this chance to complete your Dragon Ball collection, at a special new price!
The figure includes: Optional hands(L×3, R×4), Three types of optional expressions.

products.name: Bandai Dragonball Super Broly S.H. Figuarts Action Figure Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan Gogeta
products.description:
Bandai Dragonball Super Broly S.H. Figuarts Action Figure Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan Gogeta
From the hit 1995 theatrical anime "Dragon Ball Z: Fusion Reborn" comes the fusion of Gokou and Vegeta, the ultimate Super Saiyan Gogeta! And now he's also slated to appear in the upcoming film "Dragon Ball Super: Broly," in a never-before-seen God Super Saiyan form! This figure has it all, from the nostalgia factor of a beloved character to an all-new appearance from his latest film! Exchangeable hand parts(3 each), optional head part(black hair ver.), exchangeable face expression parts×3 are included.

Action figures Dragon Ball

These characters from the super smash hit videogame come with optional heads to replicate Super Saiyajin mode, just like in the game. products.name: Bandai Dragonball Z S.H. Figuarts Action Figure Majin Boo -EVIL-
products.description:
Action figures Dragon Ball
S.H.Figuarts, always dedicated to capturing both the posability and form of popular characters, is proud to announce the arrival of Majin Buu -EVIL-! In keeping with his evil countenance, the set includes plenty of parts to let you recreate your favorite scenes. It also includes an extra head for the S.H.Figurarts Majin Buu -GOOD- figure (sold separately) to further enhance your display possibilities! This set includes two optional heads, three sets of optional hands, the optional Majin Buu -GOOD- head, and head effect parts.

Based on the Dragon Ball Z anime series
Part of the S.H.Figuarts series

Interchangeable parts and accessories

Zarbon figure
3 Pairs of interchangeable hand parts
3 Interchangeable facial expression parts

Shouting
Clenched teeth
Grinning


Interchangeable hair parts





Additional Details
S.H.FiguartsThis palm-sized action figure series brings together advanced techniques in modeling, movement, and coloring to create realistic renditions of your favorite characters.

Dragon BallDragon Ball is the widely known and beloved Japanese franchise created by Akira Toriyama. The Dragon Ball manga franchise has been serialized in Shonen Jump since 1984, along with a few long running anime series starting with Dragon Ball, Dragon Ball Z, and more recently Dragon Ball Super.

products.name: Figma EX042 Deadpool DX Ver
products.description:
The smooth yet posable figma joints allow you to act out a variety of different scenes.
 	A flexible plastic is used in specific areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
 	He comes with three face plates including his standard expression, a glaring face as well as a grinning expression.
 	His swords, a knife and two different handguns are all included as weapons for him to use.
 	A huge selection of hand parts including hands in a heart shape, a thumbs-up hand, pointing hand, aloha hand and more are included!
 	The DX ver. also includes an alternate head part with his mask half open and a chimichanga to display him enjoying his favorite food!
 	An alternate lower body part showing his heart patterned underwear, two sai weapons and two rifles are all included.
 	An articulated figma stand is included, allowing various poses to be taken.
